choices: She poops you out in her diaper
She poops you out on the floor
14111.content: You slide down her neck and land in her tummy you look around and see half digested food wait please don't digest me you say as you close your eyes for the last time.
14111.title: Yyour digested

141111.content: After what seems like an eternity she finally digests you and poops your remains into her diaper. She giggles at the mess you made her and she decides to keep you on during napping hours.
141111.title: She poops you out in her diaper

choices: A worker takes you from her.
1413.content: It seems like forever, but you finally feel her grab your legs, and start to pull you from her mouth. With a wet pop your pulled free and brought up to eye level. She had a huge grin on her face and was giggling. "Wow! You taste good so good I want to share you with my friend." You squirm and struggle to get out of her fist. The thought of being shoved into another mouth of a child is too much to bear. She she giggles at your struggles as if they tickle her hand. "Your funny! My friend is going to like you." You walk Play area of the daycare, and approaches another child. She taps them on the shoulder and they turn around. The child she is about to hand you too is a --------------
1413.title: She gives you to another kid to be sucked on.

choices: False alarm, now to try and escape
143.content: You notice she is bringing you towards her behind, before you can even scream in fear she has shoved you down into her diaper. You notice that you are close to her butt cheeks and it may just be you panicking but you think you heard her stomach gurgling.
143.title: Back

choices: You managed to get out of the diaper
1432.content: You soon realizes that it potty time
1432.title: Poopy diaper time!

15.content: Ms. Butterfield! Surely she will see you and help you! Shes wearing a black pencil skirt, and a low-cut pink t-shirt. She has dirty blonde hair (the color. not that shes blonde and her hair is dirty.) and blue eyes. And freckles on her cheeks. Shes also wearing white socks and no shoes. Shes walking straight towards you and...
15.title: Ms. Butterfield, the head caretaker

151.content: She glances down at you and you feel a wave of relief as she bends down to look at you. "Help me! I've been shrunk an-" "Looks like one of the kids left their toys in here." She says in an almost deafening voice. "No please! I'm not a toy! I got shrunk and i don't know how!" She doesn't hear you and she picks you up in her gigantic hand almost crushing you. And she brings you to her side and walks out of the room. "Excuse me! Everyone!" All the children stop playing and look up at her. "Someone left a toy in that room!" She points to the room where she came from. "Whose toy is this?" All the children gather around her. And she crouches down and looks at them, and puts her hand out with you in it. You can feel all the children's eyes look at you. And their warm breath breathing down on you. "I-It's mine..." Who says this?
151.title: She notices you.

1511.content: A little girl who looked about four. "Are you sure?" "Yeah!" She says with a smile holding her little pudgy hands out. She is wearing a pink frilly skirt and a t-shirt with a butterfly pattern on it. She has blonde hair and freckles on her cheeks she also has blue eyes and the cutest little nose ever. "Okay then! Be more careful!" "I will" She grabs you quickly in her little hands and runs to the other side of the room. And everyone goes back to what they were doing. "Please help me! I'm not a doll!" Does she hear you?
1511.title: A little girl (You choose age)

choices: Play a game she thinks is a lot of fun.
15111.content: Yes I know. I’m the one that shrunk you. When you arrived I thought you would make a fun toy to play with. Your very cute! So I’ll let you choose how I play with. You can be my dolly and we play dress up. Or we can play another game that I have a lot fun playing.
15111.title: Yes

choices: Inside the closet with all the girly dresses
In the bathtub behind the curtain
151112.content: Aww. You don’t want be my cute dolly. Okay then let the games begin! All the other kids are outside playing right now. So let’s play hide and seek. You go hide. I’ll close my eyes. For 60 seconds. If I find you before the other kids come back you lose and get punished. If you win. I might make you big again. She closes her eyes. And starts counting. 1. 2. 3. You look around there’s not many places closes enough for you to hide. So you run inside the Barbie doll house. Where do you choose to hide?
151112.title: Play a game she thinks is a lot of fun.

1511122.content: 10. 11. 12. 13. 14. 15. 60. Ready or not here I come. She first looks inside the Barbie doll house. Hmm the living room nope. The bedroom nope. The bathroom she moves the curtain. Found you! I win! You found me but you didn’t even count to 60. Too bad it’s time for your punishment. She picks you up and heads for the bathroom. She stops in front of the toilet and holds you over the toilet bowl. Look down little guy do see that ring on the bottom. It’s mine one of the boys took it from me and dropped it in there. The water is too yucky for me to touch. I want you to get it for me. Then she drops you in. Now I’m going to go it’s almost nap time. I’ll come and get you after times up and don’t worry the toilets out of older. She then walks out.and closes the door. You definitely don’t like the smell. It’s definitely mostly pee. But you don’t have a choice. You hold your breath and swim down to get the ring. It was fairly easy to pick up. And swim to the surface. Once you catch your breath. You see the door opening.
1511122.title: In the bathtub behind the curtain

choices: Do you try get her attention
Do you just wait for the little girl
15111222.content: Oh no mrs. butterfields runs in. Oh no I really have to go the Plummer won’t be here until tomorrow. But I can’t wait until I get home. She runs up to the toilet turns around pulls her skirt down and her pink panties and sits on the toilet. You may have a great view but don’t like what’s coming next. All of a sudden she farts which nearly knocks you out, then really soft poop comes out of her butt hole. Lands right on your face nearly drowns you. Then lots of little poops come out. She’s having diarrhea! You are covered in poop. You think to yourself i should of chosen the dolly option. You notice one of the logs is harder than the others you get out of the water and sit on it. Then all of a sudden she pees right on you. It burns you a little but washes some of the poop off of you. Then she cleans herself off. Gets up puts her clothes back on. And goes to the sink to wash her hands.
15111222.title: Mrs. butterfields walks in

152.content: She doesn't notice your there. You try to out run her was she walks towards you, but after a few steps, her foot kicks you into the air. You fly upwards and are caught in the air coming out of an air conditioning unit. After a few moments you feel your self falling back down and look to see you going to land....
152.title: She doesn't notice you.

1522.content:
You hit the padding of the changing table bouncing a few times. Taking a moment to collect your self you stand up and walk to the edge and look down. It to far to safely jump down, so you will need help, and decide to wait sitting for another worker to come by. You don't wait too long be fore you see on coming over holding a little boys hand. Standing up you run back onto the padding and start yelling and jumping to get her attention. She however doesn't see you and lifts up the boy to put him on the table. You run to get out of the way, but your not fast enough, and his diapered bottom comes down on top of you. You squirm but your stuck. You can hear her undoing the tape from the dirty diaper. The weight is lifted off of you and you roll forward a little bit when she pulled the diaper from under the kid. When she let go of his legs you are once again stuck in place Under his butt. Next she lifted his large to place the new diaper under him.


Were you......
1522.title: On the changing table

1523.content: You feel into where the kids playing area is. You land in front of a 4 year old girl who is busy playing with toys. She doesn't seem to notice you. You try to get her to notice you, but it doesn't seem to work. She rests her hand on the floor. You decides to jump on to it. You then feel that the earth begins to shake and your lifted up...
1523.title: Where the kids are playing

info.brief_description: You're shrunk at a daycare center! Look out!
info.description:
Welcome to Shrunk At Daycare!

Your name is, well, your name, and you're busy working your first day at a daycare center, however while working, you shrink to the size of a bug! Are you going to try to find out what happened and survive? Or are you going to end up as some kid's lunch. or worse?
